resources.string: This is a test of the emergency Bacon system. If you or your family are in danger of running out of bacon, please contact emergency services. This is not a drill, Bacon is love, Bacon is life. May the Bacon gods have pity on your family and bless you with its meaty goodness.

This app determines your phones location and shares it with Google in order to serve personalized alerts to you. This allows for a better overall app experience.
